artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. Orange & yellow warp. Last 1" of warp orange only. Yellow, brn & metal. copper weft. Twill. Larsen dscriptive tag attached to sample. Machine edged on 2 sides. (orange, brown, yellow, copper metallic)

title: Pomegranate
